author: Huei Song
title: U Mobile Introduces New Unlimited Power Prepaid with Free Calls, Unlimited Data for Facebook, and More
text:
Pinterest 
Finally after about one and a half years, U Mobile is back again with a new prepaid plan, and this time it’s better than ever. Called the Unlimited Power Prepaid, the new prepaid plan, as its name suggests, comes packed with unlimited data for you to use on some of the most popular social networks available. 
The new Unlimited Power Prepaid gives you “unlimited power” with a brand new service called App-Onz, which offers unlimited data on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter. This means that you can share, upload and view posts on these networks without having to worry about your data quota. “We are extremely excited about our new prepaid pack, Unlimited Power. It really does pack a puch with the App-Onz bundling. We hope our prepaid customers will be able to share unlimited excitement on platforms such as Facebook, Instagram and Twitter with their unlimited App-Onz data.” – Jasmine Lee, Chief Marketing Officer of U Mobile. 
So, what’s the catch? According to U Mobile, there is no fine print for App-Onz and customers will enjoy the unlimited data “anytime, anywhere”. This is in-line with the telco’s approach to give customers what they really want and need from their data experience. U Mobile’s “Shop Till U Drop III” Event Gives You a Chance to Win a Shopping Spree and an iPhone 6s Plus 
U Mobile Unlimited Power Prepaid pack will be available to customers starting tomorrow, 17 February 2017. It will also come bundled with 300 minutes of free calls every month to all U Mobile numbers. Don’t want to get a new prepaid pack? If you are an existing U Mobile prepaid subscriber, you can switch over to Unlimited Power Prepaid by dialing *118*6*2*3# from your phones starting tomorrow. 
As for the new App-Onz service for postpaid subscribers, it will be available to all customers on Hero Postpaid (U28, P50, P70 and P98) and Broadband plans. Existing postpaid customers will get App-Onz from 25 February 2017, while new postpaid customers who sign up from tomorrow onwards will get to enjoy App-Onz immediately. 41
